title: MySQLREPEAT()Function

metadata.description: Learn about MySQLREPEAT()Function with clear explanations and practical examples.

content_sections.title: Details
content_sections.content:
❯
Example
Repeat a string 3 times:
SELECT REPEAT("SQL Tutorial", 3);

Definition and Usage
The REPEAT() function repeats a string as many times as specified.
Syntax
REPEAT(
string
,
number
)
Parameter Values
Parameter
Description
string
Required. The string to repeat
number
Required. The number of times to repeat the string
Technical Details
Works in:
From MySQL 4.0
More Examples
Example
Repeat the text in CustomerName 2 times:
SELECT REPEAT(CustomerName, 
  2)
FROM Customers;

Example
Repeat the string 0 times:
SELECT REPEAT("SQL Tutorial", 0);
